## IState type

Gesture responder states

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type IState = 'NOT_RESPONDER' | 'RESPONDER_INACTIVE_PRESS_IN' | 'RESPONDER_INACTIVE_PRESS_OUT' | 'RESPONDER_ACTIVE_PRESS_IN' | 'RESPONDER_ACTIVE_PRESS_OUT' | 'RESPONDER_ACTIVE_LONG_PRESS_IN' | 'RESPONDER_ACTIVE_LONG_PRESS_OUT' | 'ERROR';
```
